column3: “Looks like this strain has hit the Tucson/Phoenix area.  It's nice.  Relaxing and energizing.  Sharp focus as well.  After a few hits, household tasks seem almost interesting. I felt like a wanted to go around the house and fix (little) things..... Euphoria is what I generally look for in weed and I would say this strain is not particularly euphoric.  It does have it's charms.”

“I think I'm in love with Sourlope. I almost get butterflies in my stomach when I'm about to smoke some. The high is so lovely. And as it fades away, it leaves behind a beautifully warm glow. I've never felt this way about a strain before. It's now a must have if my dispensary ever carries.”
“i grow this strain”

“Sourloup is one of my favorite. Can be found almost all places have it.  Always testing 20+even28+ thc this is no joke this is a heavy bud but it holds true to the hybrid high almost confusing high. But love it.”
“Super focused and in a good mood!”

“[👼✨🍄💥🌸🍥]
            👈     
That was my creative interpretation of this bud.”
“Sourlope one of my favorites back in 2007 wAs the top sativa from grey area coffeeshop Nl amazing flavor beautiful colored buds and a great euphoric effect one of my favorites!”
“Beautiful plant”

“I like the lope. This strain is strong, tasty and relaxing for a sativa. It definitely got my mind loose but it's no prom queen. I'd recommend it for sure and would not turn it down if it passed my way again.”
“This just hit Mass (508) & let me tell you I am loving the after flavor, very citrusy 🍊”
“Sourlope one of my favorites back in 2007 wAs the top sativa from grey area coffeeshop Nl amazing flavor beautiful colored buds and a great euphoric effect one of my favorites!”
“Vaped nicely. Strong head buzz but overwhelming paranoia and not the energetic, uplifting feeling I was going for. It's personal preference of course but I did not care for this strain at all.”
“Beautiful plant”
“For me this has a really strong head high feeling. this is a favorite of mine to vape when I have chores around the house it really helps me stay active and the chores 10 times more fun :)”
“One of my favorites.  I'm high tolerance and paradoxical" so it's difficult for me to find strains that don't mess with my anxiety
column4: depression or ptsd. This does nicely.  A strong buzzy head
column5: but not fuzzy. It's good for daytime for me.  Not motivating or energizing
column6: but doesn't make me lazy.  On my personal scale

column3:
“I waited more than a year for this wonderful strain to make its way back to the area--and it was worth the wait!!
Arizona Organix are the only ones around that have it, and their flower did not disappoint.  It's a nice head, not too buzzy,  but you feel the stone, and not too focused"  but leaves you with clarity that is perfect for daytime.
“My absolute favourite !!!! Stay motivated and productive while on top of the world”
“Great Sativa. Very good strong high.. That lasts most importantly”
“Nice strain but doesn't last logng.”

“Jesus. You're going to get things done, that's for sure.  Mucho energy, si? Little short on legs, though. 2 to 3 hr. before having to remedicate. .. but they'll sure as hell be productive hours. deals with inflammation fairly well, good smell.”
“Best strain I've ever had. The batch I got tested over 26% THC and left so much kief. Super clear headed and uplifting. Good for days or evenings without harsh sativa effects.”
“Very good solid sativa,..baIanced, good for days or late afternoons, good for useful creative things around the house, or running errands.”
“Very tasty and helpful for studying or focusing. Good pre-workout/yoga”
“made some magical cannaoil with this!”

“This is a strong Sativa that has a very fruity or tropical taste to it.  Has a lot of trichomes on it, so use a grinder to harvest some kief from breaking it up for smoking.  When the medicine is working on you, true to its Sativa nature, its very energetic, euphoric, and just lively.  It does have a kick to it, meaning it's runs on the stronger side of the Sativas.  

I've used this during the day for pain managemen...”
“looks great , just not enough for the long time smoker, but still real nice and better then most”
